text: Emile Marie Laurent (October 1, 1852 - October 1930), was the Prefect of Police of Paris from September 1914 to June 1917. ==Biography== He was born October 1, 1852 in Brest, France. He served in the military from 25 October 1875 to 5 October 1877. He was appointed as the Prefect of Police of Paris on September 2, 1914. He retired on June 5, 1917. He died in October 1930 in Paris. ==References== Category:1852 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Prefects of police of Paris
title: Émile Marie Laurent
